Title: Establishes the commission for the modernization and revitalization of the state university of New York downstate medical center
Summary: Establishes the commission for the modernization and revitalization of the state university of New York downstate medical center which directs such commission to conduct a study to examine services that should be offered at SUNY downstate medical center; directs the commission to submit a report and make recommendations to the legislature.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to establishing the commission for the modernization and revitalization of the state university of New York downstate medical center
